data.text: @CKartofelpuffer @bookingcom Hi There! If you bought your tickets from a third party, then they are your booking owner and receive refunds from WIZZ. They should request a refund from Wizz Air on your behalf. In the future, we advise booking directly with us through our website: https://t.co/ZAbxHCCski.

urls.description: Fly with Europe's greenest ultra-low cost airline. Friendly service, low fares and lots of destinations.

data.text: @LLaaTTyy Hi There! passengers traveling with infants/children can take either a foldable stroller OR a car seat free of charge as a checked-in item. If the infant has an extra seat on board then they can take the car seat on board for free and check in a stroller.

@M_Alhomaid Hi Mohannad! You can also submit a claim via the following link https://t.co/NczmeUXW7j, our colleagues will get back to you in 30 days, via email. We kindly ask for your patience in the meantime. Thank you for your cooperation.

urls.title: WIZZ – Dream more. Live more. Be more.
urls.description: Fly with Europe's greenest ultra-low cost airline. Friendly service, low fares and lots of destinations.

data.text: @digitalpadagog @eutravelrights Hi Rune! If you have been waiting more than 30 days for a response, you can contact us via Live Chat or Call Centre: https://t.co/r9b52CloVG, our colleagues can check and inform you accordingly.

@Alanmulgrove Hi Alan! We're truly sorry that your flight has been canceled - this is never a decision that is easily made by us. You must have received your options by Wizz shortly. You can contact us via Live Chat and Call Centre: https://t.co/7lQfJc1lZL

data.text: @Madyan9 @alinmuresann Hi Madyan! You can bring a foldable baby stroller or a small foldable travel cot free of charge. It can be carried to the aircraft door or portable stairway, where one of our crew will stow them safely for you. Your stroller can be tagged at the boarding gate. Have a safe flight!
@carlmpalmer100 Hi Carl! Please accept our sincere apologies for the delay. Please contact us via the Live Chat or Call Centre and we will assist you as soon as possible: https://t.co/y2HzLdDlzJ.

data.text: @angliavandenis Hi There! Please accept our sincere apologies for the cancellation. The easiest way to request a refund is on your Profile page. If you type "chat with an agent" on the chat then you'll be connected to an available agent as soon as possible: https://t.co/sE9j5n4Mpd.

data.text: @Warren_36_ @WizzAirNot Hi John! We're sorry to hear about this. If you lost items on board, please contact the Lost & Found desks at both departure and arrival airports. If our cabin crew finds any items, they leave them at one of the two airports. We hope you'll be reunited with your belongings soon!
@iThamer10 Hi Thamer! Unfortunately, this is not possible. Thank you for your understanding.

@AgnesTkacz Hi There!  We're truly sorry for the inconvenience. This is never a decision that is easily made by us. You must be sent your options by Wizz shortly. You can check other available destinations on our website: https://t.co/a4iBwuFHxJ.

data.text: @Artemiy91388461 @willemklaus Hi There! Unfortunately, it is not possible to use the credits in your account for purchasing the ticket in the name of other passengers if you are not one of the passengers. Thank you for your understanding.

@SloTurn Hi There! As an airline, we require only a valid travel document (ID card or Passport) and the Boarding Pass. We recommend you contact the embassy or other local authorities of your destination country to check if they require any additional documents.

@Mark_Cumbo Hi Mark! We would love to learn more about your experience with us. Could you please submit a claim via https://t.co/9lsnIkW9eW? Our colleagues will get back to you in 30 days. We kindly ask for your patience in the meantime and thank you for your feedback in advance.
